value.stringValue: Please Complete your Compass Induction Form
Please Complete your Compass Induction Form

fields.name: AddPartner
fields.fieldText: Would you like to add a partner to the system?

fields.name: Extra_Partner_Text
fields.fieldText: It appears that there are extra patients in this household that have not been linked as partners. Please select the partner that you want to link below.

fields.name: Additionalinfo
fields.fieldText: Information to be added from RIMS

fields.name: Number_of_Previous_Cycles_in_RIMS
fields.fieldText: Number of Previous Cycles in RIMS

fields.name: displaytext
fields.fieldText: Would you like to send an induction form to this patient?

fields.name: DisplayInductionText
fields.fieldText: Would you like to send an induction form to this patient?

textTemplates.name: InductionEmailNotificationPt1
textTemplates.text: Dear {!Get_New_Patient_1.FirstName}, Welcome to Compass! You have been sent an electronic induction form to this email address. We request that you have this filled and signed at least a week BEFORE your treatment at Compass Commences. If you are unsure about how to answer some of the questions on this form, please get in contact and a friendly team member will assist. If you have trouble locating this consent, please check your junk, spam and any other filtered mailboxes. If this doesn’t help, please search the key phrase “AirSlate” or “Compass” in your inbox. If you are still unable to locate this form, please get in touch and report this to a Compass team member. When filling this form please ensure your details are correct, as submitting this form will automatically update your patient file. If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact Compass Fertility on 02 6175 9000 or by emailing info@compassfertility.com.au Kind Regards, {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}, {!$User.Title}

textTemplates.name: InductionEmailNotificationPt2
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Get_New_Patient_2.FirstName},
Welcome to Compass!
You have been sent an electronic induction form to this email address. We request that you have this filled and signed at least a week BEFORE your treatment at Compass Commences. If you are unsure about how to answer some of the questions on this form, please get in contact and a friendly team member will assist.
If you have trouble locating this consent, please check your junk, spam and any other filtered mailboxes. If this doesn’t help, please search the key phrase “AirSlate” or “Compass” in your inbox. If you are still unable to locate this form, please get in touch and report this to a Compass team member.
When filling this form please ensure your details are correct, as submitting this form will automatically update your patient file.
If you have any other questions or concerns, please contact Compass Fertility on 02 6175 9000 or by emailing info@compassfertility.com.au
Kind Regards,
{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}, {!$User.Title}
